Shareholder Name: Bulaihed Nasser Al Otaibi Al Bulaihed

Description: Alahli Takaful Co (known as: ATC) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since August 2007. ATC operates within the Insurance sector focusing on Multi-line Insurance. ATC is based in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia and was established in August 2007.
